rules_text:
Lifelink
When Bright-Eyed Adventurer enters the battlefield, rediscover an enchantment card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's an enchantment card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“This isn't the end of the world. It's the start of a new and glorious one.”[/i]
